title: Sharecropping and crop lien system - result

content.prompt: Which of the following was a consequence of the shift to sharecropping and the crop lien system in the late nineteenth-century South?

choices.label: A cycle of debt and depression for Southern tenant farmers
A rise in cotton yields per acre from antebellum production levels
The termination of the control exerted by White landowners of former slaves

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
